message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. Let me know if this works for you.
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more. You can take it or leave it.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in our favor, Alice. This respects the diminishing value of money while still being fair. Let me know what you think.
I'll meet you halfway. 50/50 seems fair considering the inflation. Let's end this here.
